actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to remove from the Federal courts jurisdiction of certain cases involving voluntary prayer in public schools or buildings.
short_title: Voluntary Prayer in Public Schools and Buildings Act

summary.text: Voluntary Prayer in Public Schools and Buildings Act - Eliminates Supreme Court and Federal district court jurisdiction to review and hear any case arising out of State law relating to voluntary prayer in public buildings and schools.

titles.title: Voluntary Prayer in Public Schools and Buildings Act
A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to remove from the Federal courts jurisdiction of certain cases involving voluntary prayer in public schools or buildings.
